item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description:
"You are the drop,and the ocean you are kindness,you are anger, you are sweetness,you are poison. Do not make me more disheartened.
you are the chamber of the sun, you are the abode of venus, you are the garden of all hope. Oh, Beloved, let me enter." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Study me as much as you like, you will not know me, for I differ in a hundred ways from what you see me to be. Put yourself behind my eyes and see me as I see myself, for I have chosen to dwell in a place you cannot see." -- Rumi

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life?" -- Rumi

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished?" -- Rumi

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "In your light I learn how to love. In your beauty, how to make poems. You dance inside my chest where no-one sees you, but sometimes I do, and that sight becomes this art." -- Rumi

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Rumi Jalalud-Din
item.description: "Two there are who are never satisfied -- the lover of the world and the lover of knowledge." -- Rumi Jalalud-Din

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Jalaluddin Rumi
item.description: "There are thousands of wines that can take over our minds. Don't think all ecstasies are the same!" -- Jalaluddin Rumi

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Go to heaven for the climate and hell for the company." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Ever notice how 'What the hell' is always the right answer?" -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "When we are tired, we are attacked by ideas we conquered long ago." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Bertrand Russell
item.description: "To teach how to live without certainty, and yet without being paralyzed by hesitation, is perhaps the chief thing that philosophy, in our age, can still do for those who study it." -- Bertrand Russell

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Plato
item.description: "One of the penalties of refusing to participate in politics is that you end up being governed by your inferiors." -- Plato

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "If you understand others you are smart. If you understand yourself you are illuminated. If you overcome others you are powerful. If you overcome yourself you have strength. If you know how to be satisfied you are rich. If you can act with vigor, you have a will. If you don't lose your objectives you can be long-lasting. If you die without loss, you are eternal." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Fredrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I assess the power of a will by how much resistance, pain, torture it endures and knows how to turn to its advantage" -- Fredrich Nietzsche

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Agatha Christie
item.description: "If you place your head in a lion's mouth, then you cannot complain one day if he happens to bite it off." -- Agatha Christie

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Sun Tzu
item.description: "Be extremely subtle even to the point of formlessness. Be extremely mysterious even to the point of soundlessness. Thereby you can be the director of the opponent s fate." -- Sun Tzu

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Sun Tzu
item.description: "Invincibility lies in the defence; the possibility of victory in the attack." -- Sun Tzu

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Sun-Tzu
item.description: "If you are near the enemy, make him believe you are far from him. If you are far from the enemy, make him believe you are now" -- Sun-Tzu

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Rabindranath Tagore
item.description: "We read the world wrong and say that it deceives us." -- Rabindranath Tagore

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by R. Tagore
item.description: "Those who are near me do not know that you are nearer to me than they are Those who speak to me do not know that my heart is full with your unspoken words Those who crowd in my path do not know that I am walking alone with you Those who love me do not know that their love brings you to my heart" -- R. Tagore

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "Tact is the ability to tell someone to go to hell in such a way that they look forward to the trip." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "A lady came up to me one day and said 'Sir! You are drunk', to which I replied 'I am drunk today madam, and tomorrow I shall be sober but you will still be ugly." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Personally, I'm always ready to learn, although I do not always like being taught." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "We do not have to become heroes overnight. Just a step at a time, meeting each thing that comes up, seeing it as not as dreadful as it appears, discovering that we have the strength to stare it down." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by eleanor roosevelt
item.description: "One's philosophy is not best expressed in words; it is expressed in the choices one makes. In the long run, we shape our lives, and we shape ourselves. The process never ends until we die. And the choices we make are ultimately our own responsibility" -- eleanor roosevelt

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "The only things one can admire at length are those one admires without knowing why." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Freedom makes a huge requirement of every human being. With freedom comes responsibility. For the person who is unwilling to grow up, the person who does not want to carry his own weight, this is a frightening prospect." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "When will our consciences grow so tender that we will act to prevent human misery rather than avenge it?" -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Pornwan add a quote by Iris Murdoch
item.description: "I hate solitude, but I'm afraid of intimacy. The substance of my life is a private conversation with myself which to turn into a dialogue would be equivalent to self-destruction. The company which I need is the company which a pub or a cafe will provide. I have never wanted a communion of souls. It's already hard enough to tell the truth to oneself." -- Iris Murdoch
